where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ip <* QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_PRODUCT_DEFINITION' ) | pdr \ product_definition_relationship . name = 'instantiated part' ) | ( SIZEOF ( [ 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PHYSICAL_UNIT' ] * TYPEOF ( ip . relating_product_definition ) ) = 1 ) AND ( ip . relating_product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical design usage' ) ) ) = 1
